actions.text: Amendment SA 152 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 78.

Amendment SA 152 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S2296-2301; text: CR S2297-2298) To provide reconciliation instructions to reduce the deficit by $63,860,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2014 through 2023.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 152 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 152 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 78.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 152 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman.

purpose: To provide reconciliation instructions to reduce the deficit by $63,860,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2014 through 2023.
